amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the Economic Support Fund by $2 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding for Bilateral Economic Assistance by $2 million (by offset).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Millender-McDonald amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Ms. Millender-McDonald.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Millender-McDonald amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
